item.title: PAVmed Inc 10-K
item.description: PAVmed Inc, which is in the Surgical & Medical Instruments & Apparatus [3841] industry, SEC 10-K filing on March 14, 2023 had 40466 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: stock - 630 instances may - 455 instances company - 449 instances lucid - 386 instances 2022 - 375 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
